Invocation Name: richard's books
des:
Richard Ershik is a retired trade show industry business founder and CEO, turned five-time author. He wrote and published books about his army life, his work life, his entire life, a book about funny stories he remembers from his life, and a book about his life growing up on the northside of Chicago in the nineteen fifties and sixties.

This skill tells more about Richard's Books.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
